t=input()
for x in range(t):
	l=input()
	r=raw_input()
	s=''
	for i in range(l):
#		if i==0 or i==1:
#			continue
		if r[i]=='2' or r[i]=='3' or r[i]=='5' or r[i]=='7':
			s=s+r[i]
		elif r[i]=='4':
			s=s+'322'
		elif r[i]=='6':
			s+='35'
		elif r[i]=='8':
			s+='2227'
		elif r[i]=='9':
			s+='7332'
	s=sorted(s)
	k=''.join(s)
	print k[::-1]
